#include <iostream>

using namespace std;


bool Palindrome(long long int number)
{
	long long int temp = number;
	long long int rev_num = 0;

		while(temp>0)
		{
			rev_num *=10;
			rev_num += temp % 10;
			temp/=10;
		}
	

	if(rev_num == number)
	{
		return true;
	}
	else
		return false;
}

void Calculate(long long int number,long long int count)
{

	if(Palindrome(number))
	{
		cout<<count<<" "<<number<<endl;
		return;
	}
	else
	{
		long long int temp = number;
		long long int rev_num = 0;
		while(temp>0)
		{
			rev_num *=10;
			rev_num += temp % 10;
			temp/=10;
		}
		count++;
		Calculate(number+rev_num,count);
	}
}

int main()
{
	long long int number=0;
	
	int test_cases=0;
	cin>>test_cases;

	while(test_cases) {
	int count = 0;
	cin>>number;
	Calculate(number,count);
	test_cases--;
    }
	
}
